title: Maruti Suzuki
summary: Maruti Suzuki India Limited, formerly known as Maruti Udyog Limited, is an Indian automobile manufacturer, based in New Delhi. It was founded in 1981 and owned by the Government of India until 2003, when it was sold to Suzuki Motor Corporation.[2][6] As of September 2021 Maruti Suzuki has a market share of 49 percent in the Indian passenger car market.[7][8]
